page.title: 10IRVINE SERVICES * FIRE
page.content: {Dreghorn fire station}is manned by 50 firemen.Strangely nobody answers 999 phone calls,all the 999 calls go to central control in Johnston and are transferred to the nearest fire station to the incident.When we visited the fire station,they were called out to a fire while we were talking,and we saw the teleprinter readout from Johnston.The{equipment used,usually on a small fire,is a hose 25m long,breathing equipment,torches and ladders.It takes about 15 minutes to put out a medium sized fire.Carelessness by people with,chip pans,electric fires and cigarette ends are how most fires start.In our school when the fire bell goes we all walk out and line up in the playground.It took 2 minutes 45 seconds to clear the school during our last drill.
